block.p: Robyn Dawn Juskiewicz, the daughter of Dolores M. Juskiewicz of Burlington, N.C., and Thomas F. Juskiewicz of White Stone, Va., was married yesterday to Joseph John D'Onofrio Jr., a son of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph J. D'Onofrio of Sparta, N.J. Msgr. Kieran McHugh officiated at St. Francis de Sales Roman Catholic Church in Kilmarnock, Va.

The bride and bridegroom work in the Morris County prosecutor's office in Morristown, N.J. She is a law clerk, conducting legal research, drafting briefs and providing other supportive legal services, and he is an assistant prosecutor and a team leader in the trial division.

Robyn Dawn Juskiewicz, the daughter of Dolores M. Juskiewicz of Burlington, N.C., and Thomas F. Juskiewicz of White Stone, Va., was married yesterday to Joseph John D’Onofrio Jr., a son of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph J. D’Onofrio of Sparta, N.J. Msgr. Kieran McHugh officiated at St. Francis de Sales Roman Catholic Church in Kilmarnock, Va.

Robyn Dawn Juskiewicz, the daughter of Dolores M. Juskiewicz of Burlington, N.C., and Thomas F. Juskiewicz of White Stone, Va., was married yesterday to Joseph John D'Onofrio Jr., a son of Dr. and Mrs. Joseph J. D'Onofrio of Sparta, N.J. Msgr. Kieran McHugh officiated at St. Francis de Sales Roman Catholic Church in Kilmarnock, Va.

The bride and bridegroom work in the Morris County prosecutor's office in Morristown, N.J. She is a law clerk, conducting legal research, drafting briefs and providing other supportive legal services, and he is an assistant prosecutor and a team leader in the trial division.

Mrs. D'Onofrio, 27, is also the coach of the junior varsity girls lacrosse team at Pope John XXIII High School, from which she graduated and where the wedding officiant, Monsignor McHugh, is the principal. She received both a bachelor's degree and an M.B.A. from Norwich University in Northfield, Vt., and received her law degree from Syracuse University.
Mr. D'Onofrio, 39, graduated from Villanova and received his law degree from Widener University.
